Articles.Content:
Amazing S.S.T.O. witch can easely get you into kerbin orbit easely get you into Mun orbit and with a refuel and a graffity assist at the mun easely get you to duna screenshots:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

http://imgur.com/a/pRlY6

Download link: https://www./?6dopyap8ixi0m6o

Way to fly:

Toggle SAS

Press 3 or space

Take off

Nose of the craft 45 degree's in the air full speed

When at 15 KM in the air slowely start tilting forward (very very slowely)

when at 20 KM in the air level plane and start the slow climb to 30 KM

Reach a speed between 1700 M/S and 2300 M/S

When at 30 KM press 1 for engine swap

Circelize Orbit at about with the pereapsis 115 KM

when past atmoshere press 2 to open solarpanels

How to go interplanitary:

Get a reveul station in orbit around the Mun (Both jet and rocket)

Get the eacock to get an encounter with the moon

Circulize orbit and dock with Reveul station

Revuel all veul tanks

Escape Mun Gravitational pull (slingshot)

Get an encounter with Said planet

Circulize orbit

Land

How to land:

Make orbit small enough to airobreak

press 4 to activate parachutes

Use engines to slow yourself down

Land and tip the nose to the front

The end

Edited December 9, 2014 by TheAnimePug
